text: Muhammad Taqi Misbah Yazdi Giwachi (; 31 January 19351 January 2021) was an Iranian scholar, philosopher and conservative political theorist. He was a spiritual leader of the Front of Islamic Revolution Stability. From 1999 to 2016, he was a member of the Assembly of Experts. Yazdi was born in Yazd, Iran. Mesbah Yazdi died on 1 January 2020 in Tehran at aged 85.محمد تقی مصباح یزدی، عضو مجلس خبرگان ایران در ۸۵ سالگی درگذشت ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Iranian politicians Category:Iranian philosophers
title: Taqi Yazdi
